description.zh-cn: 满族姓氏，位列满族八大姓，因其名列《八旗满洲氏族通谱》首位，有“满族第一大姓氏”、“满洲巨族”的说法。清朝时期，该氏族为官人数众多，素有“关满朝”之称。
description.en: A Manchu clan, listed among the Eight Great Manchu clans. It is considered the 'number one Manchu clan' and a 'great Manchu clan' as it is listed first in the 'Genealogy of the Manchu Clans of the Eight Banners'. During the Qing dynasty, many members of this clan served as officials, earning it the nickname 'the Gūwalgiya court'.

description.zh-cn: 后金开国五大臣之一，苏完部长索尔果次子。早年归附努尔哈赤，战功卓著，被努尔哈赤誉为“万人敌”。
description.en: One of the Five Founding Ministers of the Later Jin dynasty, and the second son of Solgo, chief of the Suwan tribe. He submitted to Nurhaci early in his life and was renowned for his military achievements, earning the praise 'a match for ten thousand men' from Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 清朝初年权臣，康熙帝四大辅臣之一。出身将门，半生军旅，战功赫赫，后因专擅朝政被康熙帝铲除。
description.en: A powerful courtier in the early Qing dynasty and one of the Four Regents for the Kangxi Emperor. He came from a military family, spent half his life in the army, and had illustrious military merits. He was later removed by the Kangxi Emperor for monopolizing state power.

description.zh-cn: 清末重臣，出身乌喇瓜尔佳氏。
description.en: A prominent statesman in the late Qing dynasty, from the Ula branch of the Gūwalgiya clan.

description.zh-cn: 清末重臣，出身苏完瓜尔佳氏。
description.en: A prominent statesman in the late Qing dynasty, from the Suwan branch of the Gūwalgiya clan.

description.zh-cn: 苏完瓜尔佳氏的部长，费英东、卫齐之父。
description.en: Chief of the Suwan branch of the Gūwalgiya clan, father of Fiongdon and Weiqi.

description.zh-cn: 索尔果第九子，鳌拜之父。
description.en: The ninth son of Solgo and the father of Oboi.

description.zh-cn: 费英东第七子，清朝初年将领。在清军入关及统一南方的战争中屡立战功，曾消灭南明隆武政权。
description.en: The seventh son of Fiongdon and a general in the early Qing dynasty. He made significant military contributions during the Qing conquest of China, including the destruction of the Southern Ming's Longwu regime.

description.zh-cn: 后金的建立者，清朝的主要奠基人。
description.en: The founder of the Later Jin dynasty and the primary founder of the Qing dynasty.

en: Five Founding Ministers of Later Jin

description.zh-cn: 努尔哈赤建立后金时所倚重的五位主要大臣。
description.en: The five principal ministers upon whom Nurhaci relied when establishing the Later Jin dynasty.

en: Four Regents of the Kangxi Emperor

description.zh-cn: 顺治帝临终前为辅助年幼的康熙帝而指定的四位辅政大臣。
description.en: The four regents appointed by the Shunzhi Emperor on his deathbed to assist the young Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 由女真首领努尔哈赤建立的政权，清朝的前身。
description.en: A state established by the Jurchen leader Nurhaci, the predecessor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 后金第二位大汗，清朝的开国皇帝。
description.en: The second Khan of the Later Jin and the founding emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明末海西女真四部之一。
description.en: One of the four tribes of the Haixi Jurchens in the late Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明末海西女真四部之一。
description.en: One of the four tribes of the Haixi Jurchens in the late Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由汉族建立的最后一个大一统王朝。
description.en: The last great unified dynasty in Chinese history established by the Han people.

description.zh-cn: 明朝灭亡后，由明朝宗室在南方建立的政权。
description.en: A regime established in southern China by remnants of the Ming imperial family after the fall of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南明第二位皇帝。
description.en: The second emperor of the Southern Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明末清初的政治和军事人物，原为明朝重臣，后投降清朝。
description.en: A political and military figure of the late Ming and early Qing dynasties. He was originally a high-ranking official of the Ming dynasty before surrendering to the Qing.

description.zh-cn: 明末清初军事家，引清兵入关，后发动“三藩之乱”。
description.en: A military strategist of the late Ming and early Qing dynasties who let the Qing army enter the Shanhai Pass and later launched the 'Revolt of the Three Feudatories'.

description.zh-cn: 明末清初将领，降清后又起兵反清。
description.en: A general in the late Ming and early Qing dynasties who surrendered to the Qing and later rebelled against them.

description.zh-cn: 明末农民起义领袖，大西政权的建立者。
description.en: A leader of a peasant rebellion in the late Ming dynasty and the founder of the Daxi regime.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，实际统治时间最长的皇帝。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the longest-reigning emperor in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 汉军正白旗人，瓜尔佳氏。明末将领，后金攻打广宁时举城投降。
description.en: A member of the Gūwalgiya clan from the Plain White Banner of the Han Martial. He was a Ming dynasty general who surrendered the city of Guangning when the Later Jin attacked.

description.zh-cn: 石国柱之弟，随兄投降后金。
description.en: Younger brother of Shi Guozhu, who surrendered to the Later Jin along with his brother.

description.zh-cn: 石国柱之弟，随兄投降后金，战功卓著。
description.en: Younger brother of Shi Guozhu, who surrendered to the Later Jin along with his brother and achieved significant military success.

description.zh-cn: 石国柱、石天柱、石廷柱之父。
description.en: Father of Shi Guozhu, Shi Tianzhu, and Shi Tingzhu.

description.zh-cn: 明末将领，后降清，封定南王。
description.en: A general in the late Ming dynasty who later surrendered to the Qing and was enfeoffed as Prince of Dingnan.

description.zh-cn: 皇太子允礽的嫡福晋（太子妃），石文炳之女。
description.en: The primary consort (Crown Princess) of Crown Prince Yunreng, and the daughter of Shi Wenbing.

description.zh-cn: 石廷柱之孙，太子妃瓜尔佳氏之父。
description.en: Grandson of Shi Tingzhu and father of Crown Princess Gūwalgiya.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的嫡次子，曾两度被立为皇太子，后被废黜。
description.en: The second son of the Kangxi Emperor and his primary consort. He was twice appointed Crown Prince and was later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员，出身瓜尔佳氏。
description.en: Hong Kong actress, descended from the Gūwalgiya clan.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员，关之琳之父。
description.en: Hong Kong actor, father of Rosamund Kwan.

description.zh-cn: 费英东是苏完部长索尔果的次子。
description.en: Fiongdon was the second son of Solgo, chief of the Suwan tribe.

description.zh-cn: 卫齐是索尔果的第九子。
description.en: Weiqi was the ninth son of Solgo.

description.zh-cn: 鳌拜是卫齐的第三子。
description.en: Oboi was the third son of Weiqi.

description.zh-cn: 图赖是费英东的第七子。
description.en: Tulai was the seventh son of Fiongdon.

description.zh-cn: 费英东是后金开国五大臣之一。
description.en: Fiongdon was one of the Five Founding Ministers of Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 鳌拜是康熙初年的四大辅臣之一。
description.en: Oboi was one of the Four Regents in the early years of the Kangxi Emperor's reign.

description.zh-cn: 费英东早年归附努尔哈赤，努尔哈赤授其为扎尔固齐，并将自己的孙女嫁给他。
description.en: Fiongdon submitted to Nurhaci early in his life. Nurhaci appointed him as a 'jarguci' (judge) and married his granddaughter to him.

description.zh-cn: 费英东曾征讨乌喇。
description.en: Fiongdon campaigned against the Ula tribe.

description.zh-cn: 费英东曾征讨叶赫。
description.en: Fiongdon campaigned against the Yehe tribe.

description.zh-cn: 图赖率军征福建，消灭了南明隆武政权。
description.en: Tulai led an army to conquer Fujian and destroyed the Southern Ming's Longwu regime.

description.zh-cn: 鳌拜在征锦州时屡次击败洪承畴所率领的明军。
description.en: During the campaign for Jinzhou, Oboi repeatedly defeated the Ming forces led by Hong Chengchou.

description.zh-cn: 鳌拜在征锦州时屡次击败吴三桂所率领的明军。
description.en: During the campaign for Jinzhou, Oboi repeatedly defeated the Ming forces led by Wu Sangui.

description.zh-cn: 鳌拜曾统兵平定姜瓖的叛乱。
description.en: Oboi once led troops to suppress the rebellion of Jiang Xiang.

description.zh-cn: 鳌拜在征讨大西军时阵斩其首领张献忠。
description.en: During the campaign against the Daxi army, Oboi killed its leader Zhang Xianzhong in battle.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝亲政后，因鳌拜专权而将其铲除，革除其爵位。
description.en: After taking personal rule, the Kangxi Emperor removed Oboi from power due to his authoritarianism and stripped him of his titles.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝追念鳌拜功绩，恢复其一等公爵，并加封号为超武公。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor, in recognition of Oboi's merits, restored his title of First-Class Duke and bestowed upon him the title 'Chaowu Gong' (Duke of Transcendent Valor).

description.zh-cn: 石天柱是石国柱的弟弟。
description.en: Shi Tianzhu was the younger brother of Shi Guozhu.

description.zh-cn: 石廷柱是石国柱的弟弟。
description.en: Shi Tingzhu was the younger brother of Shi Guozhu.

description.zh-cn: 石翰是石国柱、石天柱、石廷柱的父亲。
description.en: Shi Han was the father of Shi Guozhu, Shi Tianzhu, and Shi Tingzhu.

description.zh-cn: 石天柱是石翰的次子。
description.en: Shi Tianzhu was the second son of Shi Han.

description.zh-cn: 石廷柱是石翰的三子。
description.en: Shi Tingzhu was the third son of Shi Han.

description.zh-cn: 石国柱在镇守盖州时，招降了孔有德所部数千人。
description.en: While defending Gaizhou, Shi Guozhu induced the surrender of several thousand troops under the command of Kong Youde.

description.zh-cn: 太子妃瓜尔佳氏是石文炳的女儿。
description.en: Crown Princess Gūwalgiya was the daughter of Shi Wenbing.

description.zh-cn: 瓜尔佳氏是皇太子允礽的太子妃。
description.en: Lady Gūwalgiya was the Crown Princess of Crown Prince Yunreng.

description.zh-cn: 演员关之琳是演员关山的女儿。
description.en: Actress Rosamund Kwan is the daughter of actor Guan Shan.
